title: Android app deals of the day: Lovecraft’s Untold Stories, QR/Barcode PRO, DISTRAINT, more
content:
Monday afternoon is here with all of today’s best Android app deals courtesy of Google Play. Our software offers join deals on the Hisense H8 4K ULED Android TVs as well as Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 models and even more right here. But for now we are focused on the apps including highlights like Lovecraft’s Untold Stories, QR and Barcode Scanner PRO, DISTRAINT: Deluxe Edition, Earthlings Beware!, Toby: The Secret Mine, and much more. Hit the jump for even more of today’s best Android game and app deals. 

more…
